item.name: Client Addresses
item.description: API endpoints for managing clients addresses

body.raw: {"first_name":"John","last_name":"Panda","company_name":"Google LLC","street_address":"Jinnah Avenue near Zero Point","coordinates":"{\"lat\": \"57886\", \"lng\": \"23112\"}","zip_code":64200,"city":"Islamabad","street_address2":"Front of Jinnah Park"}

request.description:
This endpoint allows you to add commonly used addresses for user.
To add new addresses you need access_token generated by this authentication endpoints.

This endpoint allows you to fetch all addresses created by Client.
To add new addresses you need access_token generated by this authentication endpoints.

item.name: Client Authentication
item.description: API endpoints for managing clients authentication

request.description:
This endpoint allows you to register client and generate token for authentication.
Along token client details will be displayed. To call authorized endpoints you need access_token generated by this endpoint.

This endpoint allows you to generate token of client after authentication.
Along token client details will be displayed. To call authorized endpoints you need access_token generated by this endpoint.

This endpoint allows you to remove client token generated for authentication to logout user.
To logout token must be required in header otherwise client will be Unauthenticated.

This endpoint allows you to send request for forgot password.
To make request user must be registered with system and have a valid email. After request
user will receive email with password reset link.

This endpoint allows you to update profile of user.
To update profile data you need access_token generated by this authentication endpoints.
This endpoint allows you to store device token to send notifications to the customers.
This endpoint allows you to authorize by social account like facebook and google.

request.description:
This endpoint allows you to get notification of the authenticated customer.
To get notifications you need token from Auth end points.

item.name: Driver Authentication
item.description: API endpoints for managing drivers authentication

request.description:
This endpoint allows you to register driver and generate token for authentication.
Along token driver details will be displayed. To call authorized endpoints you need access_token generated by this endpoint.

This endpoint allows you to remove driver token generated for authentication to logout user.
To logout token must be required in header otherwise driver will be Unauthenticated.

This endpoint allows you to generate token of driver after authentication.
Along token driver details will be displayed. To call authorized endpoints you need access_token generated by this endpoint.

This endpoint allows you to update profile of user.
To update profile data you need access_token generated by this authentication endpoints.
This endpoint allows you to store device token to send notifications to the drivers.

This endpoint allows you to online/offline it's availability.
To do this need authorization token.

This endpoint allows you to update driver recent location coordinates.
To do this need authorization token.
This endpoint allows you to fetch all shipments created near driver.
This endpoint to accept or reject a broadcasted shipment.
This endpoint allows you to fetch all shipments created near driver.
This endpoint to accept or reject a broadcasted shipment.
This endpoint allows you to get default settings of the project.

item.name: Shipments
item.description: API endpoints for managing shipments controls

request.description:
This endpoint allows you to get active vehicles along their charges.
To get active vehicles you need access_token generated by this authentication endpoints.

This endpoint allows you to calculate charges base on vehicle and user addresses.
To call authorized endpoints you need access_token generated by authentication endpoints.

This endpoint allows you to create a new shipment against the logged in user. This endpoint contains Address, Charges and Payment method details.
To call authorized endpoints you need access_token generated by authentication endpoints.

This endpoint allows you to get shipments against the logged in user.
To call authorized endpoints you need access_token generated by authentication endpoints.

request.description:
This endpoint allows you to get shipment detail against the shipment id.
To call authorized endpoints you need access_token generated by authentication endpoints.
